holidays.title: Choral Day
holidays.description: Join us as thousands of choirs around the world get together to unite in song.

holidays.title: Constitution Day in Thailand
holidays.description: Join the colorful parades and street festivities taking place on Constitution Day in Thailand.

holidays.title: Day of the Virgin of Guadalupe
holidays.description: Celebrate with us and we honor the day the Virgin Mary appeared before a young man.

holidays.title: Festival of Unmentionable Thoughts
holidays.description: We are all guilty of having unmentionable thoughts every now and then.

holidays.title: Gingerbread Decorating Day
holidays.description: Gingerbread cookies, gingerbread houses … it’s a gingerbread world to unleash your artsy side!

holidays.title: Green Monday
holidays.description: Leave space on your credit cards, it's a dash to the finish line!

holidays.title: Guadalupe Day
holidays.description: She is a remarkable part of believers’ daily lives — in their homes, churches, prayers, and community.

holidays.title: International Day of Neutrality
holidays.description: The possibility of a utopian world is promoted annually on International Day of Neutrality.

holidays.title: International Universal Health Coverage Day
holidays.description: Promote this holiday to support the provision of affordable healthcare to everyone.

holidays.title: Jamhuri Day
holidays.description: Let’s take a look at Kenyan independence and the way it is celebrated.

holidays.title: National Ambrosia Day
holidays.description: Bring a healthy, invigorating dish to life, and expect it to do marvelous things for your youth.

holidays.title: National Clayton Day
holidays.description: What does Clayton mean? Where did the name come from? Find out on National Clayton Day.

holidays.title: ​National Ding-A-Ling Day
holidays.description: National Ding-A-Ling Day is one of those uniquely American inventions.

holidays.title: National Poinsettia Day
holidays.description: That pop of floral color in everyone's home means the holidays are right around the corner.

holidays.title: Pa Togan Nengminza Sangma
holidays.description: Learn more about the history of Pa-Togan Nengminza Sangma and how to celebrate this holiday.

holidays.title: Universal Health Coverage Day
holidays.description: Let’s come together to demand action on universal health coverage.

holidays.title: Bob Barker’s Birthday
holidays.description: One of his game shows ran for 35 years! Bob Barker is amazing!

holidays.title: Crainer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Discover Crainer and become a guest in his digital world — gaming, videos, feuds, and friendships.

holidays.title: Erika Diane’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s not just any content creator. Here’s why Erika Diane is all heart.

holidays.title: Frank Sinatra’s Birthday
holidays.description: Those who witnessed over 50 years of his talents have a good memory of him.

holidays.title: Hila Klein’s Birthday
holidays.description: A true example of a “power woman,” Hila Klein is a successful, powerful and caring woman.

holidays.title: Jennifer Connelly’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Oscar-winning actress’s career took off decades ago, and she keeps soaring!

holidays.title: John Jay’s Birthday
holidays.description: He enacted some policies that helped shape the future of his people.

holidays.title: Lincoln Melcher’s Birthday
holidays.description: From child actor to amateur golfer, discover the journey of Lincoln Melcher.

holidays.title: Lucas Hedges’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actor started at a really young age and is ready to take on the world!

holidays.title: Mariela Fernández’s Birthday
holidays.description: She does her job well and keeps an ever-smiling face while at it!

holidays.title: Mayim Bialik’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actress rose to prominence due to her numerous roles in popular films and television shows.

holidays.title: Regina Hall’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are amazed by how the red-hot Regina Hall stepped into the spotlight!

holidays.title: Sheila E.’s Birthday
holidays.description: This award-winning singer has taken us through an exciting journey of a lifetime.

holidays.title: Shy Glizzy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young rapper is built to win, and we can’t wait to see all he achieves.
